description:
Despite national efforts to make gender a thing again, not everyone seems to have gotten that memo. That is why some leftist universities refuse to acknowledge the existence of biological reality when it comes to sports competition. This is also why one fencing player had no choice but to forfeit her match after being paired with a man.

🤺🚨Historic Protest: Female Fencer Takes a Knee in Bout Against Male Opponent, Faces Immediate Disqualification

After receiving a black card for refusing to compete against a man, Redmond Sullivan's female opponent was expelled from the @USAFencing event at the Univ. of… pic.twitter.com/IloSnrb2Iu
— ICONS (@icons_women)
title: They tried forcing a female fencer to compete against a (trans) man, but she took this brave stance instead

description:
If your entire self-worth is based on affirming indescribable feelings, that’s a sign you are not competent enough to run for office. Nonetheless, one narcissistic council member believes otherwise and is now contemplating suing the city after “they” took a month-long leave of absence for being misgendered.

Thu Nguyen, the nonbinary MA city councilor who took over a month off from work because someone "misgendered" her, is now considering filing a lawsuit against the city of Worcester for "retaliating" against her.

Nguyen claims that the City of Worcester is attempting to "withhold… pic.twitter.com/yfhxUl6Fb5
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok)
title: Nonbinary Councilmember decides her month-long mental health break after being misgendered was not enough, so now she's suing

description:
What was believed to be a slow year for airline passenger freak-outs has taken a turn in favor of the content. Since March, at least three newsworthy instances have taken place.

The first occurred after a Southwest Airlines passenger stripped herself naked while screaming, forcing the flight to return to the gate. The second was when a “possessed” man swallowed a Rosary and attacked flight attendants. The third occurred even before the offender boarded the plane.
title: Yet ANOTHER Spirit Airlines passenger had a crazy naked meltdown, then police had to get involved

description:
The Trump Administration is getting heat for supposedly deporting a Maryland father under a clerical error. Today’s show gets into why this is nothing more than a media lie.

“They are looking to pull on your heartstrings and imply that someone who has fathered children can’t be taken from kids for committing crimes,” Crowder said.

According to the media, this man was wrongfully deported.
title: Watch: The Media Wants You To Believe Trump Deported A Loving Father - They're Lying

description:
It’s unclear how many times Trump or Elon Musk have to confirm that no one has plans to cut social security or Medicaid, but that won’t stop the left from blatantly lying about that.

CNN’s Abby Phillip tried to make that claim, despite having no evidence to back it up, and was put in her place by former Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker.

MUST SEE: Abby Phillip BLATANTLY lies about Elon Musk on stage in Green Bay saying he would cut Social Security and Medicare benefits, when he said the exact opposite. Scott Walker does not let her get away with it.

Phillip: "He came to the state and talked about cutting… pic.twitter.com/vkf9dD1yLl
— DeVory Darkins (@devorydarkins)
title: CNN’s Abby Phillip repeats lie after lie about Elon Musk, but her GOP guest refuses to let her get away with ANY of them

description:
Compelled speech is unconstitutional speech, despite how one “feels” deep down inside. So, while it would be unconstitutional for the government to require you to properly gender someone, it’s also wrong for them to require one to gender someone improperly. However, the latter is so much worse because it’s a lie but the pursuit of truth won’t stop Colorado Dems from trying.

Under this new bill, schools cannot mandate dress codes based on gender. Therefore, men can wear skirts, and no one can do anything about it if passed. It would also make it a crime to intentionally misgender someone. And the worst part is the custody provision, which “would prohibit using a transgender parent’s identity against them and would shield parents who allow their kids to get gender-affirming care.”
title: Democrat-run state moves RADICAL new pro-trans bill, includes criminalizing your right to free speech

description:
Germany issues a warning to travelers. Representative Cory Booker breaks the record for filibustering. We break down all the important parts of his 25 hour speech. The Trump Administration came under fire for wrongfully deporting a Maryland father to El Salvador. Are you sure about that?

TRANS FLEES TO GERMANY; HUNGARY BANS THEM

  • German government issues advisory for trans, nonbinary people traveling to US
title: Sources: Why the Deported Father Story Is One Huge Media Lie!

description:
Last night, there were special elections in Wisconsin and Florida. As is usual during off-year special elections, a lazy and easily bored media attempts to find meaning in it. That usually means if the results were bad for the GOP, they have a MAJOR PROBLEM. If the result were good, they weren't as good as they should have been, and special elections don't matter much anyway. Losing the Wisconsin Supreme Court race definitely su-diddly-ucks, but that wasn't the only thing on the ballot last night.

Radical activist progressive Judge Susan Crawford defeated the candidate who knows how to follow the Constitution, Brad Schimel. Wisconsin will now redraw its congressional lines, making things more difficult for the GOP to hold on to the House in 2026. It is what it is. It was always going to be difficult. If the Trump Adminstration and th
title: Don't let the media lie, Donald Trump and MAGA had a huge victory in Wisconsin last night
